growth Protocol REF

column1: brief info for each microscopic image
column2: date when this image was taken
column3: Oil refractive index used for microscopic assays
column4: cell type used for microscopic assays
column6: probe number used in each channel for microscopic assays
column7: extension after reconstruction of the sim acquired images
column8: number of channels for each microscopic image
column9: extension after alignment of the sir images using Chromagnon v0.86
column10: extension after Threshold-16-bits of the aligned images using Fiji
column11: image number for each probe combination
column13: chromosome number to which belong the probe
column16: size of the probe in base pair ; difference between chromosome end and start coordinates
column17: number of oligonucleotides in the probe
column19: Primer code for the combination of the primers
column30: the name of the cell line used
column34: plasmid construct of the cell line used
column35: AUXIN treatment for the used cell
